alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Prairie; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Woodruff, southeastern Prairie and northern Monroe Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from 6 miles northeast of Hazen to 6 miles west of Brinkley. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brinkley... Clarendon... Hazen... De Valls Bluff... Fredonia... Roe... Alfrey... Allendale... Dobbs Landing... Peppers Landing... Hallsville... Tollville... Brasfield... Dagmar WMA... Keevil... Monroe... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 195 and 216. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
